channel.title: Deep Learning on Dang-Khoa's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Dang-Khoa's blog

item.title: Hashing in content-based image retrieval
item.description:
Since I worked at SUTD, I have been working on the content-based image retrieval. It is very active in academia and industry. Actually, there are some works I have accomplished:

  1. Image hasing: a joint optimization for image embedding and hashing (CVPR17 paper).
  2. Deep Image Retrieval: a scheme for unified deep learning and image retrieval (ACM MM17 paper).
  3. Mobile version of Triangulation Embedding.
  4. Deep Hashing Image (In progress).
